title: Sometimes my sound doesn't work. Can you help?
body: I was playing League like i always did. In the client everything worked fine. I went ingame and after some time, i noticed that sometimes (every 2-5 minutes) my sound is gone for 2-5 seconds. After that game enden my client was completly mute. After restarting i had the same issue from the beginning again

replies.body: That's a strange issue, and I'm wondering if a driver or game file is failing while in-game.  To start, I suggest using the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to update your drivers and tune up your PC.  You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to repair your game files, included in that guide.  Usually, the patcher should detect a bad game file (or sound file), but a repair will make sure it gets picked up.  I hope that helps!

Thanks for the answer. I have followed most of your steps but it's too late for me to play another game long enough to be sure to encounter that issue - or not encounter it. I will tell you tomorrow if it worked.
